text: Exede Internet was launched in 2012 through ViaSat. It provides broadband internet to the United States. Exede service is powered by the ViaSat-1 satellite. ViaSat-1 earned the Guinness World Record title for the highest- capacity communications satellite. The Exede service currently serves 687,000 customers in the U.S.ViaSat to rev up faster Internet with new satellite . Mike Freeman. November 9, 2015. San Diego Union Tribune. November 18, 2015 ==History== Launched in 2012, Exede Internet is a broadband internet service that covers areas traditional internet service providers do not reach. In 2013, Exede introduced Exede Voice home service as a companion to the data service. Exede also offers Exede Business. It launched in 2014. It also offers Exede Enterprise for live events, field operations, and disaster response. ==References== Category:2012 disestablishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Delaware Category:American internet service providers Category:Satellites
title: Exede
